Clifton.East Orange STEM Academy:
East Orange STEM Academy is a specialty magnet public school that serves students in sixth through twelfth grades in East Orange, in Essex County, New Jersey, United States, operating as part of the East Orange School District. The school focuses on the STEM fields, the academic disciplines of science, technology, engineering, and mathematics.
As of the 2014-15 school year, the school had an enrollment of 574 students and 52.0 classroom teachers (on an FTE basis), for a student–teacher ratio of 11.0:1.
